pyramid scheme.translation[0].definition: a dishonest and often illegal way of selling investments, in which money from people who invest later is used to pay people in the system who have already invested
pyramid scheme.translation[1].definition: a dishonest way of selling investments, in which the money paid by new investors is used to pay interest and other money owed to existing investors. When new investment brings less than the money owed, new investors lose their money
